nodes.text: Xyrias Undea was a Human female rogue Corellian Security Force officer who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

After the Battle of Yavin, Xyrias Undea was leading a group of Rogue CorSec criminals in Doaba Guerfel. Circa 1 ABY, they harassed Gwhirrye Baric, a small-time thug who ran a spice racket out of a small hospital in Doaba Guerfel. A CorSec agent working for Captain Vitala Baize accepted to help Gwhirrye with his problem and killed several Rogue CorSec miscreants, including Xyrias Undea. In return, Gwhirrye Baric agreed with helping the CorSec to investigate the Chirq Council.

Xyrias Undea was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Xyrias Undea was added to the game with the update named "Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives", published on June 8, 2006.
